pages.text: This version of Elementaristics contains some bug fixes I, Aelpecyem, have been working on, while also adding quite a lot of content. In this build, this content is only half-implemented, so don't expect too much from what is currently only half-there.

In case you find any bugs, let it be with implemented or half-implemented content, don't hesitate to report them at the mod's github page. Make sure to always explain what happened before and to link the crash log though.
